name: CONCATE NATION
description:
Please try the LoFi version of the game if you're experiencing low frame rates. 

Story:

Could you be a rebellious dissident or maybe a loyal party member?

Perhaps a Machiavellian puppet master or just a simple downtrodden cog lost in the system?

As the world burns, a brutal totalitarian regime determines your fate through an exhaustive but mandatory psyche evaluation.

Credits:

Aemetta - Lead Programmer

smaxbat - Writer, Concept

Crompwell - Programmer, 3D artist & Environmental Design

Willowblade - Art & Programming

DarkRaven - Sound Design

Submitted for Godot Wild Jam #12
